html:
cast the lot. Those in the Lamb's book are chosen as the Lord's servants.

divided…by line. By a godly decree the land once known as Edom is surveyed and apportioned to those whose names are in the Lord's book (Rev. 21:27). The earth, once a telestial world inhabited by telestial beings, will become a celestial kingdom, inhabited by celestial beings.

for ever/generation to generation. The righteous will inhabit the earth eternally.
